document_title: Anal abscess: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_content:
Anal abscesses cause pain, discomfort and can even lead to serious complications if not treated promptly. Therefore, applying preventative solutions right from the beginning is really necessary, including:
Actively control sexually transmitted diseases (use condoms when having sex, minimize anal sex...).(3); Keep the anal area clean; Treatment of diseases that are at risk of leading to anal abscesses such as Crohn's disease, constipation, ulcerative colitis...; Change diapers regularly to prevent anal abscesses in infants.
